amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to prevent funds from being used to implement, administer, or enforce a proposed rule by the VA to limit an injured or amputee veterans ability to choose a prosthetist or orthotist who meets his or her needs whether employed by the VA or on contract with the VA.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A066) offered by Mr. Walberg.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A066) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
